text: Maxim Boghiu (born 24 May 1991, Chișinău, Moldova) is a Moldavian football defender who plays for FC Academia Chișinău. ==Club statistics== *Total matches played in Moldavian First League: 77 matches - 0 goal ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Sportspeople from Chișinău Category:Moldovan footballers Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Zimbru Chișinău players Category:FC Sfântul Gheorghe Suruceni players Category:FC Speranța Crihana Veche players Category:FC Academia Chișinău players
title: Maxim Boghiu
